scripts.dev: bun run export && wrangler dev -e dev src/index.ts
scripts.deploy: bun run export && wrangler deploy -e production --minify src/index.ts
scripts.push: bun run export && wrangler deploy -e production --minify src/index.ts
scripts.export: bun export/builder/setswitch.ts --true && tsup --config export/builder/tsup.config.ts && bun export/builder/setswitch.ts
